1: <pb/>Re' Bildad aj ar suhita je' wili ruchaq'weesjiik xub'an:
2: <pb/><t>Re' i QaJaaw Dios nim rajaawriik, wilik ruyohb'alil wach.</t> <t>Eh re' reh inye'wik rusuqkiil kik'ux i wilkeeb' pan taxaaj.</t>
3: <t>Re' reh xiik' naah k'ihaal taqe i ruánjel.</t> <t>Eh re' i rusaqumaal insihq'inik cho chinaah chu'nchel.</t>
4: <t>Wila' je' re'. ¿Mi neerub'an chi neeruq'or</t> <t>reh i Dios jino'q i winaq chi saq wach i ránima?</t> <t>¿Mi neeruq'or chi ma' xta ru mahk</t> <t>i xa ayu' aasjinaq wach ak'al?</t>
5: <t>Re' poh insihq'inik, je' wo' taqe i ch'umiil,</t> <t>xa re' la' xama' rureq ta wo' chi je' rukab' i ruloq'il i Dios</t>
6: <t>Wila' je' re' ra'j naa chik re' i winaq nee rureq chi je' rukab' i ruloq'il i Dios,</t> <t>ruum xa ayu' tii wach ak'al x-aasjik, xa je' rukab' i k'isa haah chuwach inki.</t>
